thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Mrs Geraldine Clifford
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Mrs Geraldine Clifford

author: Mrs Geraldine Clifford
title: Mrs Geraldine Clifford
text: I bought track suits online and paid straight away but two days later I was contacted by the customer service team because the pants were not in the wear house , they were very helpful and friendly and sorted the issue for me .Thank you for a great service.
